title: Crick Crack, Monkey - author uses capital letters

content.question: The author uses capital letters for some words in the second paragraph primarily to

choices.label: call attention to the idealized notions of the narrator as a young girl
reveal the narrator’s lack of sophistication as a writer
emphasize the narrator’s playful attitude as a young girl

content.answer: call attention to the idealized notions of the narrator as a young girl

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain the function of structure in a text.
